popt4jlib.GA

Class IntVarArrayNPtXOverOp

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.GA.IntVarArrayNPtXOverOp

  • public class IntVarArrayNPtXOverOp
extends java.lang.Object
    class implements the standard N-point crossover operator on chromosomes represented as int[] objects.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IntVarArrayNPtXOverOp(int n)
      public constructor accepts as sole argument the number of points the crossover operator must use.

      Pair doXover(java.lang.Object c1, java.lang.Object c2, java.util.Hashtable params)
      the method implements the standard N-point crossover operator operating on int[] chromosomes of varying length!.

    • Method Detail

      • doXover

        public Pair doXover(java.lang.Object c1,
           java.lang.Object c2,
           java.util.Hashtable params)
             throws OptimizerException
        the method implements the standard N-point crossover operator operating on int[] chromosomes of varying length!.
        Parameters:
        c1 - Object int[]
        c2 - Object int[]
        params - Hashtable must contain the following key,value pair:
      • <"thread.id",$integer_value"> mandatory, the (internal) id of the thread invoking this method; this number is used so as to look-up the right random-number generator associated with the current thread.
        • Returns:
        Pair
        Throws:
        OptimizerException
